page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: My day begins early. Usually about seven o'clock. I get up and watch the news, then I go downstairs. I have my breakfast at about quarter to eight. Then I get ready to go to school. We set off at about quarter past eight. We arrive at half past. First thing in the day we have assembly, then we have three lessons which last forty minutes then it is break. We all go outside for fifteen minutes. Most people play on the swings and slides but I prefer playing other things, like Hide and Seek or just on my own. Then when the bell goes we have to go in. We have another two lessons then it is lunch. We have a set menu. After lunch I go out and play. Then it is lessons until it is time to go home. I put on the computer and play a game. My sister likes television. After tea I go to bed.
